text: For ASCUS/LSIL, repeat cervical cytology 12- monthly and return to routine screening after 2 consecutive negative cytology results.If there is a high-grade cytology (ASC-H, HSIL, AGC, AIS) or persistent abnormal cytology for 2 years, colposcopy should be performed.
